var result = arr

queries.map {
	let (s, e, k) = ($0[0], $0[1], $0[2])
	
	for i in s...e {
		if i % k == 0 {
			result[i] += 1
		}
	}
}
return result

import Foundation

func solution(_ arr:[Int], _ queries:[[Int]]) -> [Int] {
    
    var result = arr
    
    queries.map {
        let (s, e, k) = ($0[0], $0[1], $0[2])
        
        for i in s...e {
            if i % k == 0 {
                result[i] += 1
            }
        }
    }
    return result
}
